scripts.clone: git clone https://github.com/SAP/abap-file-formats input && rm input/file-formats/*/examples/* && rm input/file-formats/*.json && rm input/file-formats/*/type/*.json
scripts.rename: abaplint abaplint_rename.json --rename && rm -rf src/* && cp -r output/input/file-formats/* src/ && mv ./src/*/type/* ./src/
scripts.mirror: rm -rf input && rm -rf output && npm run clone && npm run rename && npm run fix_result
